subject: re:Looking for medications?
body:
Dear customer.
Tired of paying twice the price of a med when buying it from a "reliable" licensed USA Web pharmacy? Our discount Canadian e-shop will show you what real "low prices" should look like.
CanadianPharmacy warns you about the growing threat of drug poisoning caused by low-quality medications sold by underground online pharmacies without a license. Choose the best and save on it purchase real generic medications from licensed manufacturers at CanadianPharmacy. Our prices will please you.
CanadianPharmacy turn Canadian drug sales taxation system to your advantage.
Sincerely yours,Alejandro Rivas
